comment: The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
amr:
# ::snt The N word is highly offensive.   All ethnicities and social groups deserve tolerance.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "N"))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (d / deserve-01
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (e / ethnic-group
                        :mod (a2 / all))
                  :op2 (g / group
                        :mod (s2 / society)
                        :mod (a3 / all)))
            :ARG1 (t / tolerate-01)))

comment: Each person is different. It makes more sense to judge a person by their character rather than their race.
amr:
# ::snt Each person is different. It makes more sense to judge a person by their character rather than their race.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / differ-02
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :mod (e / each)))
      :snt2 (s / sense-02
            :ARG1 (j / judge-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person)
                  :ARG3 (c / character
                        :poss p2)
                  :ARG1-of (ii / instead-of-91
                        :ARG2 (r / race
                              :poss p2)))
            :ARG2-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 j
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more))))

comment: Just refer to the musical group by their abbreviation.
amr:
# ::snt Just refer to the musical group by their abbreviation.
(r / refer-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (g / group
            :mod (m / musical))
      :ARG2 (a / abbreviation
            :poss g)
      :mod (j / just))
